titleLong: Tale of Two Sides: A 2D platformer

images.description: The phasing mechanic is a lot of fun to control!
This game includes lots of narrative elements!
An intro storyboard screen illustrating how the protagonist broke the world by breaking a crystal.
An intro storyboard screen illustrating how the protagonist broke the world by breaking a crystal.
The protagonist caused the terrible split in the world by breaking a crystal.
You collect a fragment of the broken crystal at the end of each level.
Along the way, you meet NPCs who have become separated from their friends and family during the divide.
The final crystal that you reach at the end of the game.

videos.description: A gameplay video for Tale of Two Sides.
